pl.hubertkarbowy.ExamsAdmin

Class ExamsGlobalSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.hubertkarbowy.ExamsAdmin.ExamsGlobalSettings

  • public class ExamsGlobalSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton (kind of) class containing session-specific information This class contains a number of utility methods for formatting and parsing client-server communication via sockets. The bulk of work is done by sendAndReceive(String) method which sends a command to the server and returns the response as string. The response can be fed to the tokenizer in {@link StringUtilityMethods#tokenize(String, Delimiter, int...) to obtain a list.

      • sendReceiveAndDeserialize

        protected static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> sendReceiveAndDeserialize(java.lang.String msg)
                                                                                     throws ExamsException
        Reads multiline records This method reads responses if the form #$#$#BEGIN#$#$#$ .... #$#$#$END#$#$#$ which contain several server database records. It then attempts to parse the strings into a list of lists with each sublist containing a single record.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to send
        Returns:
        parsed record set
        Throws:
        ExamsException
